item.title: Watch: 'I am very sorry', S Korea's president says
item.description: Watch: 'I am very sorry', South Korea's president says

item.title: New president awaits Ghana as election day arrives
item.description: The West African nation is guaranteed a new leader as Nana Akufo-Addo steps down after serving two terms.

item.title: Killing of insurance CEO reveals simmering anger at US health system
item.description: Long-standing frustrations were revealed online after a health insurance executive was shot and killed in New York City.

item.title: A love letter to attiéké, Ivory Coast's timeless culinary treasure
item.description: Attiéké has been honoured with a Unesco heritage title, which should see the delicious dish protected.

item.title: 'I don't know how we'll survive': War-damaged Lebanese businesses face the unknown
item.description: Traders and shop-owners lost their livelihoods as a result of destruction from Israeli attacks.
